posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian Collie
I need to sell some cards to help pay for some T3s I just got from Dave.  Here is what I have available. Also, if you have any T3 HOFs in 2/3, please let me know.

Beckley PSA 5 SOLD
McGinnity SGC 60 $260
Crawford Bat SGC 50 $175
Brown Portrait PSA 4 $240
McGraw Glove SOLD
Clarke Bat PSA 4 SOLD
Kelly PSA 4 SOLD
Willis Bat PSA 4 $190

T202 Brown Athletic Infield PSA 5 $325

I also have a Lajoie portrait with Sovereign back for sale.  Nice front, glue on back. $160

Please email for scans.  

Thanks,

Brian
